conbody.p: The HAL provides support for the L2 cache provided by Coherency Manager Version 3. As the CM3 is an optional feature the code to support this is not included by default. Attempts to use the default cache management code or boot code when L2 cache is external to the core will cause a UHI boot exception (L2 configuration is external to the core).
The HAL code for the CM3 is part of the supplied libcm3.a library, add this to the link using -lcm3 when targeting a core with CM3.
